verbs.description: Analysts [V: are] still waiting for hard evidence that the new tax law is setting off the investment explosion that President Trump and Republicans promised .
[ARG1: Analysts] are [ARGM-TMP: still] [V: waiting] [ARG2: for hard evidence that the new tax law is setting off the investment explosion that President Trump and Republicans promised] .
Analysts are still waiting for hard evidence that the new tax law [V: is] setting off the investment explosion that President Trump and Republicans promised .
Analysts are still waiting for hard evidence that [ARG0: the new tax law] is [V: setting] off [ARG1: the investment explosion that President Trump and Republicans promised] .
Analysts are still waiting for hard evidence that the new tax law is setting off [ARG2: the investment explosion] [R-ARG2: that] [ARG0: President Trump and Republicans] [V: promised] .
